summary: In Bangkok, an assassin who turns down a job that hits too close to home finds himself targeted by the elite members of his profession.
cast: Rick Yune|Roger Yuan|Dania Ramirez|Keith David|Bokeem Woodbine|Mitch Mulaney|Booboo Stewart|Kob|Tokolize Robbins|Owen Williams|Garrett Warren|Victoria 'Tori' Leach|Gorge|Lex de Groot|Shaun Delaney|Don Ferguson|Cyril Gouaida|David Ismalone|Erik Markus Schuetz|Damian Mavis|Antonio Rose|Niko Rusakov|Jonathan Samson|Ron Smoorenburg
keywords: assassin|killed in police car|police officer killed by silenced gun|martial arts|street shootout
title: The Fifth Commandment
